CustomField.description: COMM_AssignPSPG_To_CommunityUsers_Batch : Profiles that need to be skipped for user settings such as Salesforce1 User = False, Salesforce CRM Content User = True (Only for Partner Portal Users), Chatter Answers User = false, Receive Salesforce CRM Content Email Alerts = false, Receive Salesforce CRM Content Alerts as Daily Digest = false Note: Semi-colon separated e.g, Marketing Customer Community; this; that
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Semi-colon separated e.g, Marketing Customer Community; Prof2; Prof3
CustomField.label: BATCHJOB_PS_PG_ESCAPE_USER_SETTINGS_PROF
